author: Chris Manns
comment: First off, I love that it doesn't take over my watch face choice or anything else. It just adds an app drawer that you open by swiping from the left which did nothing before.  I hope to see the UI work much more smoothly & responsive in the upcoming updates, and perhaps some customization options after that: such as icon size, options for number of columns, show/hide app titles, maybe make the top bar scrollable & customizable with favorite apps? It's a great app! Looking forward to what's to come!
title: Great concept, lots of room for potential!

author: Luke Dyson
comment: Using for 3 days now; would be great to be able to configure what icons are displayed. Also it would be great to have a timeout feature, so the launcher hides after a configurable duration of inactivity. Found that any other apps that require swiping from the left of the screen conflicts with bubble launcher, would be great if this could detect if another app is open and disable itself.

author: Nikhil Kaduskar
comment: Takes at least 3 swipes to open the drawer. Same thing with closing the drawer. Clicking the side button puts the watch in ambient mode, but the launcher stays open. So, there's no way of escaping the tedious process of selecting the exact, small region for xlosing the drawer.
title: Swiping is difficult and doesn't close quickly

comment: Top right blue /white settings gear wheel icon not work. Top centre double white square busts gives a grey screen. Unable to find location despite android location set to on ..GPS+wifi. I hope there is an update soon as I bought licence. Sent two emails requesting assistance but no replies!

author: Arturas Masaitis
comment: I hate apps who LIE to their customers. They didn't mention anywhere about it being a trial version or that you have to buy anything, but after a couple days of use the app stops working and requires your to buy it to continue using it. Stay off these dirty liars!

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: In the app description and if you open the app you will find the hints. Please update you review thank you.

title: Dirty liars!!!

author: Mathew Smart
comment: So how do I purchase the full app? And explain properly, not just it's in the app. You clearly are not concerned with customer care are you? We are just after a clear way of purchasing your product?

author: Xalisco does
comment: The app itself is wonderful since all the apps are easy to access. Regardless the fact that nowhere in the store description note the watch app says it's only a trial brought the points down two stars, it's counter intuitive to have to open a wearable app on the phone in order to know the download is only a trial

author: L. Marie
comment: Depletes battery. Problems with swiping. I purchased as part of a bundle and after trial period it stopped asking me to pay... Watch keeps showing message android wear has stopped. Not sure if this app is causing that problem but after installing 3 apps it started. I'm uninstalling.
title: Not good.

author: Grim Tim
comment: For some reason Play Music will not launch properly. Always says "Unfortunately Play Music has stopped". Launches fine without bubble launcher. LG Urbane with Galaxy S5.
title: Problems launching Play Music

author: jeremiah gustafson
comment: The only time I used it was when I first downloaded it after that the only time trying I opportunity it was on accident. It was extremely difficult to dismiss and by the time the trial period expired and they started being for money I thought "good riddance."
title: Not worth it

comment: This is a really good launcher, which is easy and quick to use.  But the launcher would be even better if you could scroll horizontally, just like an Apple Watch launcher.  This would make it a lot easier for user to find their apps.  But this also could be fixed by having an option to sort apps alphabetically.  I will definitely buy pro version, if you install horizontal scrolling as well.
title: Great launcher but hard to find apps.

author: Ashley Browse
comment: It interferes with at least one of my apps, it'd be better if it only opened from the main screen. Otherwise not bad.

author: Thomas Parker
comment: Stuck at the activate bubble launcher. I out a check in the box and nothing happened

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: You habe to wait a few seconds. Then try to swipe in the launcher. If the error still exists, please write an email to support@wearable-software.com

title: Doesn't work

author: Martin Martinson
comment: That's what I were looking for.👍  Simply and handful.But PLEASE ADD DIGITAL CLOCK ON LAUNCHER, BECAUSE SOMETIMES I NEED CHECK OUT THE TIME, WHEN I USING SOME APP.  IF YOU DO IT, I WILL RATE YOU FIVE STARS.

author: Dexter Lee
comment: I paid for this software. But it keeps showing a message about 'TRIAL EXPIRED'. I don't know what happen also i can't fix it. i tried reinstall, resetting watch and phone!
title: It has serious problem.

author: Danfrd
comment: I'm using the Nixon Mission.  Swiping doesn't always work.  That's the most irritating when the swipe takes multiple attempts and once in a while it wont swipe off the screen at all.  Also, correct me if I'm wrong please... but I cant customize the order or view of my apps.

I tried it for 3 days and liked it!  Running on Moto 360 Gen 2. Sometimes I have to swipe more than once to open the tray,  but I have to do that on the installed base watch apps as well. I think it looks amazing and it is nice to see all of my apps easier,  and to see them all quickly by telling google to start this program.  Nice idea,  thank you.
title: Fun app

author: Darrell Howard
comment: It Works !  Takes a little bit to get the hang of swiping to open and close.
title: HUAWEI Watch

author: John Chan
comment: Slow and not configurable on my Moto 360 Gen2

author: Pauline Mulpeter
comment: No difference I thought you could choose a circle launcher once yoi paid premium so I want an refund iv a zen watch 2 its a square reason I bought it thought you could switch launcher to circules like a clock

author: Jakša Suzić
comment: This is just a 3 days trial version, not a free app like it say it is. Also can't open settings (there was a problem starting the application).

author: Thomas Guppy
comment: Decent, but could use manual app organisation and hiding of unused apps.

author: Tommy Olive
comment: Despite having paid for pro version.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Please write an email to support@wearable-software.com. Did you have an active connection to watch while buying the app? Please start the app on watch again. Then status should sync to watch. Please review again. Thank you.

title: Trial period has ended message

author: Christian Simpson
comment: Swiping is too difficult

author: Andi Stevens
comment: Get it it won't break the bank!!
title: Made the watch heaps easier to use

author: Allan Andrade
comment: PAID AFTER 3 DAYS.

author: Phillip Farmer
comment: Android wear. Love it on new moto 360 watch
title: Bubble launcher

author: Funtime HD
comment: Great app, very useful to keep organized

author: Travis Van Den Berg
comment: Works well I really like it

author: Joseph Head
comment: Sucks

author: Tariq Abu Hammoud
comment: It's useful

author: Yves Saintelo
comment: Liked it
title: Liked it

author: Wayne Dasher
comment: I wanted to try this. I wanted to use this. I wanted to buy this. On my Moto 360 Gen 2 nothing happens after install and check activate. Any suggestions?  11/13/15 After being advised by the developer to try it again, I was able to get the checkbox to activate. After activation, I was not able to get any function following the instructions supplied by the developer. Moto 360 gen 2 still not working for me.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: We fixed this issue. Please update and try again. Thank you.

author: Jose Luna
comment: Doesn't work after you check launcher.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: We fixed this issue. Please update and try again. Thank you.

title: Motor 360 gen 2

author: Richard Brown
comment: This app is non-functional.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Do you have moto 2 gen? Please try the new update and review again. Thank you.

title: It doesn't work

author: Rachel Ivey
comment: Just downloaded it and checked the box in settings but it's not working

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Which watch do you have? Moto 2 Gen? Please try the new update.

title: Not working

author: Tiffany Schmitz
comment: Much like other users, I've had trouble with it on my Moto 360 2nd Gen. It installs, I check the activate launcher box and then nothing happens. I bought this because I want to use it on my device but nothing is happening.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: We fixed this issue. Please update and try again. Thank you.

author: CG Plenty
comment: Shows in settings on my Moto 360 2nd gen. Activated but nothing happens when I swipe. Restarted watch and still nothing.

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: We fixed this issue. Please update and try again. Thank you.

title: Just installed nothing happened

comment: I bought the license but I keep being told my trial expired. help.

comment: Motorola 360 2'gen nothing..  I purchased this app please fix it!!!!

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: We fixed this issue. Please update and try again. Thank you.
